metadata.title: CVE-2018-19965 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.11.x allowing 64-bit PV guest OSusers to cause a denial of service (host OS crash) because #GP[0] can occurafter a non-canonical address is passed to the TLB flushing code. NOTE:this issue exists because of an incorrect CVE-2017-5754 (aka Meltdown)mitigation.

criterions.comment: xen package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
